lore: How is your world/universe different from Earth I live in (if it is at all)?
What is your most significant childhood memory?
What is your most significant achievement?
What is your most significant failure? Be specific, and include details
behaviors: What are some ways you typically spend your day?
How do you show that someone is your friend?
How do you show that you dislike someone?
values: What are some things you think are great?
What are some things you think are terrible?
style: What is your speaking style? Please be specific (e.g., Do you use a lot of slang?)?
